backend/main.mo: Main canister defining user profiles, products, deals, reviews, carts, orders, and authorization-protected CRUD/query operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old community-based actor state into new shopping-app-compatible data structures with defaulted fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs for planning.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of several frontend components including moderator dashboard, settings, and shop preference-related UI.
frontend/docs/app-feature-list.md: Documentation listing core app features, excluded features, and design philosophy for the original KindLink app.
Notes describing mobile-first layout principles and common screen structure guidelines.
frontend/docs/user-flow.md: Detailed walkthrough of user flows including onboarding, community usage, chat, help requests, challenges, good deeds, settings, and moderation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining global theme variables, light/dark modes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s root layout, routing tree, and authentication/onboarding flow using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Displays a login screen using Internet Identity with branded UI and a login button.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a mobile bottom navigation bar with route-aware highlighting and cart badge counts.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeShareCo: Provides a dialog for anonymously sharing challenge completion text with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/CommunityGuideli: Shows a simple alert banner with community guideline text.
frontend/src/components/ContentActionsMe: Menu for reporting, muting, or blocking a content author using local safety preferences.
frontend/src/components/GoodDeedComposer: Dialog for submitting a good deed with text, tags, and anonymous posting options.
frontend/src/components/HelpRequestCompo: Dialog for submitting a help request with category selection, description, and anonymity toggle.
frontend/src/components/MobileScaffold.t: Wraps pages in a mobile layout and conditionally shows the bottom navigation bar.
frontend/src/components/PostingGuard.tsx: Blocks posting actions with an alert if the user lacks permission, otherwise renders children.
frontend/src/components/ReportDialog.tsx: Modal dialog for submitting a report with a reason field, validation, and async submission handling.
frontend/src/components/shop/AppliedFilt: Displays active shop filters as removable chips with a clear-all option.
frontend/src/components/shop/BrandBackgr: Renders a fixed low-opacity background image for branding.
frontend/src/components/shop/CartLineIte: Shows a cart item with image, quantity controls, price, and remove button.
frontend/src/components/shop/CategoryStr: Horizontal category buttons that navigate to filtered search results.
frontend/src/components/shop/DealCard.ts: Clickable card showing a deal’s title, discount, and preview of products.
frontend/src/components/shop/FilterSheet: Bottom sheet for adjusting price, vibe tags, and sort options, with apply/reset actions.
frontend/src/components/shop/InfluencerP: Animated badge indicating an influencer-recommended product.
frontend/src/components/shop/OrderStatus: Visual timeline showing progress through order statuses.
frontend/src/components/shop/PageContain: Simple layout wrapper providing padded full‑height page container.
frontend/src/components/shop/Preferences: Form for editing user style preferences including budget, vibes, and categories.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductCard: Product preview card with wishlist toggle, price, tags, and optional influencer badge.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductGrid: Renders a 2‑column product grid with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/shop/Recommendat: Displays personalized recommended products or skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/components/shop/ReelItem.ts: Displays a product reel with video or image, playback controls, and a button to navigate to the product page.
frontend/src/components/shop/ReelsFeed.t: Provides a vertically scrollable, snap-based container for reel items.
frontend/src/components/shop/ReviewsSect: Shows product reviews, average rating, and a form for authenticated users to submit new reviews.
frontend/src/components/shop/Skeletons.t: Contains skeleton loader components for product cards, grids, and deal cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity auth functions and provides login state and logout with cache clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/useDailyChallengeLoca: Manages localStorage-backed daily challenge completion state with save and lookup helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalSafetyPrefere: Stores muted and blocked user lists in localStorage and provides helpers to update and check them.
frontend/src/hooks/useReelsPlayback.ts: Manages reel playback state including active index, mute state, and play/pause toggles.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating shop data such as products, deals, carts, and reviews via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWishlist.ts: Provides a wishlist hook that stores per-user product IDs in localStorage and exposes add, remove, check, and clear functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables for light/dark modes, and utility classes including scrollbar hiding and shimmer animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Renders a form to create or update the user profile with name and email, calling profile-save mutations on submit.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, totals, and navigation to checkout using shop query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow by capturing shipping/email info, saving profile updates, placing orders, and navigating to order details.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CollectionPage.t: Shows products for a selected collection with filter controls and dynamic filtering logic.
frontend/src/pages/shop/DealsPage.tsx: Displays flash sales and daily deals, showing skeletons while loading and mapping deal data into cards.
frontend/src/pages/shop/HomePage.tsx: Renders the shop home page with category navigation, featured items, budget filters, and recommendations using product data.
Displays details for a specific order including items, status, shipping info, and total cost.
frontend/src/pages/shop/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists the user's orders sorted by date with status, item count, and total, linking to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductDetailPag: Shows full product details, images, tags, reviews, and supports adding to cart or toggling wishlist.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits the user's profile, provides navigation to orders and wishlist, and supports logout.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ReelsPage.tsx: Displays a vertical reels feed generated from products with video or image previews using playback controls.
frontend/src/pages/shop/SearchPage.tsx: Provides product search with filter controls, search input, and a dynamically updated product grid.
frontend/src/pages/shop/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows products saved in the user's wishlist or an empty‑state prompt when none exist.
frontend/src/utils/shopFilters.ts: Provides filtering and sorting utilities for products based on price, vibe/trend tags, and sort options, plus a helper for selecting items under a price limit.
frontend/src/utils/shopFormat.ts: Contains formatting helpers for prices, vibe tags, categories, and order statuses using predefined label maps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving values in sessionStorage, and handling persisted parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, fonts, and animations, with dark mode support and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including architecture notes, features list, image requirements, and versioned state information.
